manpage.description: makl-tc is a facility command which can be used to create Makefile's using a given MaKL build template.
manpage.examples:
Create a Makefile suitable for building a C/C++ program:
$ makl-new prog $ makl .help ------------------- Available targets ------------------- all build the executable (it's the default target) ...
manpage.diagnostics: In case of error, makl-new will bail out with non-zero exit code and appropriate diagnostic message on standard output.

bugs.p: If you catch a bug, please drop a note to makl-users@koanlogic.com.
